Enum Class UnoCard.Value

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<UnoCard.Value>
cards.UnoCard.Value
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardValue, Serializable, Comparable<UnoCard.Value>, Constable
Enclosing class:
UnoCard
public static enum UnoCard.Value extends Enum<UnoCard.Value> implements CardValue
Enum represeting the Value of the card. Zero-Nine have their name as the value. Reverse -> -1, Draw Two -> -2, Skip -> -3, Draw Four -> -4, Wild -> -5
